title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3482/89 of 20 November 1989 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
header:
22.11.1989 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 338/9
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3482/89
of 20 November 1989
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN codes indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 November 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 337, 21. 11. 1989, p. 5.
ANNEX
Description of the goods CN code classification Reasons
(1) (2) (3)
1. Right or left sides of salted saithe, without the head, spinal column, fins or guts, with the skin and pin bones (epipleuralis), but without any other bones, known as ‘standard fillets’
2. A food preparation containing:
— 99,2 % sucrose
— 0,6 % aspartame
— 0,2 % acesulphame K
